acts.act: Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POCSO)

business_details.Business: Judgment delivered. Accused Anil Barman is convicted U/S 10 of POCSO Act is sentence to undergone R.I for 7 (seven) years and  to pay of  fine of Rs. 10,000/- i/d of payment of fine to undergone R.I for another 6 (six) months.
